app.title: Core Microservices
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

home.hero.title: Production-Ready Microservices.
home.hero.subtitle: Just Add Your Business Logic.
home.hero.benefit3: Common ecosystem with logging, observability and security out of the box
home.hero.benefit4: Ready Docker + Terraform + CI/CD for your system
home.features.title: Everything You Need to Launch
home.features.subtitle: Production-grade services in the Base Package
home.features.basePackageDesc: Complete backend microservices + React frontend modules
home.features.userManagementDesc: Complete authentication system with JWT, OAuth2 (Google, GitHub, LinkedIn), role-based access control, and user profiles.
home.features.communicationDesc: Multi-channel messaging with email, SMS, and push notifications. Delivery tracking and status monitoring included.
home.features.documentsDesc: S3-compatible storage with MinIO. Upload, organize, and secure your files with built-in access control.
home.features.translationDesc: Multi-language support with dynamic translation management. Add and update translations without redeploying your application.
home.features.templatesDesc: Handlebars-powered templates for emails, documents, and reports. Version control and dynamic rendering included.
home.features.frontendDesc: Modular React + TypeScript components with Vite, React Router, Hookstate, and React Bootstrap. Ready-to-use UI for all services.
home.features.additionalPackagesDesc: Extend your application with specialized features
home.features.cloudInfraDesc: Terraform modules for AWS deployment with auto-scaling and monitoring
home.features.paymentsDesc: Stripe, PayPal, and more payment gateway integrations
home.features.billingDesc: Subscription management, invoicing, and recurring payments
home.features.customerChatDesc: Real-time messaging and customer support system
home.features.clientManagementDesc: CRM features for managing customer relationships
home.features.formsDesc: Build surveys and custom forms with validation
home.ai.title: Build Faster with AI
home.ai.subtitle: Premium AI assistant with deep CoreMS knowledge - directly in your IDE
home.ai.cardDesc: Get instant access to CoreMS architecture patterns, code generation, and expert guidance powered by AI. Works seamlessly with your favorite IDE through Model Context Protocol.
home.ai.feature1Desc: Instant answers about CoreMS patterns, service structure, and enterprise best practices
home.ai.feature2Desc: Generate services, controllers, entities, and migrations that follow CoreMS conventions perfectly
home.ai.feature3Desc: Access OpenAPI specs, security configurations, and database migration templates instantly
home.ai.feature4Desc: Get smart troubleshooting suggestions based on CoreMS architecture and common patterns
home.ai.noteDesc: Requires subscription and compatible IDE with MCP support. Free tier available.
home.clients.title: What Can You Build?
home.clients.subtitle: Real-world applications powered by Core Microservices packages
home.clients.saas.title: SaaS Customer Portal
home.clients.saas.description: Multi-tenant customer dashboard with complete user management, document sharing, and automated communications.
home.clients.ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
home.clients.ecommerce.description: Full-featured online store with payment processing, order management, and real-time customer support.
home.clients.foodDelivery.title: Home Food Delivery Subscription
home.clients.foodDelivery.description: Subscription-based meal delivery service with personalized plans, recurring billing, and automated notifications.
home.clients.healthcare.title: Healthcare Patient Portal
home.clients.healthcare.description: HIPAA-compliant patient portal with secure document storage, appointment management, billing, and telehealth chat.
home.clients.cta: These are just examples. With Core Microservices, you can build any application you imagine.
